content: **knitted half-length socks in drops nord the piece is worked top down with heel gusset sizes 35 - 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #oceanprismsocks drops design pattern no-094 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length approx 22-24-26 cm leg-length to heel approx 14-15-16 cm **yarn** drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 16 jeans blue **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
